statements.select: select a.RoomId,a.RoomNo,a.ExtNo,a.BedNo,a.OccupancyNumber,b.Id,b.OldManId,b.BeginDate,b.EndDate,b.SickBedNo from Pam_Room a inner join Pam_RoomOldMan b on a.RoomId=b.RoomId where a.StationId=#StationId# and b.OldManId=#OldManId# order by b.CheckInTime desc

select 1 as NoUse from ( select OldManId,Id,CheckInTime,Status,OperatedBy,OperatedOn,DataSource,OldManName,Gender,Birthday, IDNo,HealthInsuranceFlag,HealthInsuranceNumber,SocialInsuranceFlag,SocialInsuranceNumber,LivingState,OldManIdentity, AreaId,AreaId2,AreaId3,Address,LongitudeS,LatitudeS,PostCode,Tel,Mobile,Remark,InputCode1,InputCode2,ResidentStatus ,(select r.RoomId from Pam_Room r left join Pam_RoomOldMan ro on ro.RoomId=r.RoomId where StationId=#StationId# and Status=1 and ro.EndDate >GETDATE() and ro.OldManId=info.OldManId) as RoomId ,(select FloorNo from Pam_Room r left join Pam_RoomOldMan ro on ro.RoomId=r.RoomId where StationId=#StationId# and Status=1 and ro.EndDate >GETDATE() and ro.OldManId=info.OldManId) as FloorNo ,(select RoomNo from Pam_Room r left join Pam_RoomOldMan ro on ro.RoomId=r.RoomId where StationId=#StationId# and Status=1 and ro.EndDate >GETDATE() and ro.OldManId=info.OldManId) as RoomNo ,(select ExtNo from Pam_Room r left join Pam_RoomOldMan ro on ro.RoomId=r.RoomId where StationId=#StationId# and Status=1 and ro.EndDate >GETDATE() and ro.OldManId=info.OldManId) as ExtNo ,(select SickBedNo from Pam_Room r left join Pam_RoomOldMan ro on ro.RoomId=r.RoomId where StationId=#StationId# and Status=1 and ro.EndDate >GETDATE() and ro.OldManId=info.OldManId) as SickBedNo from Pam_PensionAgencyObjectBaseInfo info
OldManId=#OldManId# Id=#Id# CheckInTime>=to_date(#CheckInTime_Start#||' 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') CheckInTime<=to_date(#CheckInTime_End#||' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') Status=#Status# OperatedBy=#OperatedBy# OperatedOn>=to_date(#OperatedOn_Start#||' 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') OperatedOn<=to_date(#OperatedOn_End#||' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') DataSource=#DataSource# OldManName=#OldManName# Gender=#Gender# Birthday>=to_date(#Birthday_Start#||' 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') Birthday<=to_date(#Birthday_End#||' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') IDNo=#IDNo# HealthInsuranceFlag=#HealthInsuranceFlag# HealthInsuranceNumber=#HealthInsuranceNumber# SocialInsuranceFlag=#SocialInsuranceFlag# SocialInsuranceNumber=#SocialInsuranceNumber# LivingState=#LivingState# OldManIdentity=#OldManIdentity# AreaId=#AreaId# AreaId2=#AreaId2# AreaId3=#AreaId3# Address=#Address# LongitudeS=#LongitudeS# LatitudeS=#LatitudeS# PostCode=#PostCode# Tel=#Tel# Mobile=#Mobile# Remark=#Remark# InputCode1=#InputCode1# InputCode2=#InputCode2# ResidentStatus=#ResidentStatus# DischargeTime>=to_date(#DischargeTime_Start#||' 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') DischargeTime<=to_date(#DischargeTime_End#||' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') DischargeNote=#DischargeNote# StationId=#StationId# ( AreaId3 in (select cast(AreaId as varchar (40)) from Pub_Area where AreaId2 like '$Area$%') or AreaId2 in (select cast(AreaId as varchar (40)) from Pub_Area where AreaId3 like '$Area$%')) $WhereClause$
) n
FloorNo=#FloorNo# RoomId=#RoomId# $WhereClause2$

select distinct 1 as NoUse,info.OldManId,info.CheckInTime,info.Status,info.OperatedBy,info.OperatedOn,info.OldManName,info.Gender ,info.Birthday,info.IDNo,info.HealthInsuranceFlag,info.HealthInsuranceNumber,info.SocialInsuranceFlag,info.SocialInsuranceNumber ,info.LivingState,info.OldManIdentity,info.AreaId,info.AreaId2,info.AreaId3,info.Address,info.LongitudeS,info.LatitudeS,info.PostCode ,info.Tel,info.Mobile,info.Remark,info.InputCode1,info.InputCode2,info.ResidentStatus ,r.RoomId,r.RoomNo,r.ExtNo,r.BedNo,r.OccupancyNumber,r.StationId,ro.BeginDate,ro.EndDate from Pam_Room r left join Pam_RoomOldMan ro on ro.RoomId=r.RoomId left join Pam_PensionAgencyObjectBaseInfo info on info.OldManId=ro.OldManId
left join Pam_OldManMappingServeMan oms on info.OldManId=oms.OldManId
where info.Status=1 and r.Status=1 and ro.EndDate >GETDATE()
and oms.EndTime>GETDATE()
info.OldManId=#OldManId# info.OperatedBy=#OperatedBy# info.OldManName=#OldManName# info.Gender=#Gender# info.IDNo=#IDNo# info.HealthInsuranceFlag=#HealthInsuranceFlag# info.HealthInsuranceNumber=#HealthInsuranceNumber# info.SocialInsuranceFlag=#SocialInsuranceFlag# info.SocialInsuranceNumber=#SocialInsuranceNumber# info.LivingState=#LivingState# info.OldManIdentity=#OldManIdentity# info.AreaId=#AreaId# info.AreaId2=#AreaId2# info.AreaId3=#AreaId3# info.Address=#Address# info.LongitudeS=#LongitudeS# info.LatitudeS=#LatitudeS# info.PostCode=#PostCode# info.Tel=#Tel# info.Mobile=#Mobile# info.Remark=#Remark# info.InputCode1=#InputCode1# info.InputCode2=#InputCode2# r.RoomId=#RoomId# r.RoomNo=#RoomNo# r.FloorNo=#FloorNo# r.ExtNo=#ExtNo# r.BedNo=#BedNo# r.OccupancyNumber=#OccupancyNumber# r.StationId=#StationId# r.BeginDate=#BeginDate# r.EndDate=#EndDate#
oms.UserId=#UserId#
$WhereClause$

select x.* from ( select top ($PageNo$*$PageSize$) row_number() over(Order By $OrderByClause$) as SN,abc.* from ( select distinct info.OldManId,info.CheckInTime,info.Status,info.OperatedBy,info.OperatedOn,info.OldManName,info.Gender ,info.Birthday,info.IDNo,info.HealthInsuranceFlag,info.HealthInsuranceNumber,info.SocialInsuranceFlag,info.SocialInsuranceNumber ,info.LivingState,info.OldManIdentity,info.AreaId,info.AreaId2,info.AreaId3,info.Address,info.LongitudeS,info.LatitudeS,info.PostCode ,info.Tel,info.Mobile,info.Remark,info.InputCode1,info.InputCode2,info.ResidentStatus ,r.RoomId,r.RoomNo,r.ExtNo,r.BedNo,r.OccupancyNumber,r.StationId,ro.BeginDate,ro.EndDate from Pam_Room r left join Pam_RoomOldMan ro on ro.RoomId=r.RoomId left join Pam_PensionAgencyObjectBaseInfo info on info.OldManId=ro.OldManId
left join Pam_OldManMappingServeMan oms on info.OldManId=oms.OldManId
where info.Status=1 and r.Status=1 and ro.EndDate >GETDATE()
and oms.EndTime>GETDATE()
info.OldManId=#OldManId# info.OperatedBy=#OperatedBy# info.OldManName=#OldManName# info.Gender=#Gender# info.IDNo=#IDNo# info.HealthInsuranceFlag=#HealthInsuranceFlag# info.HealthInsuranceNumber=#HealthInsuranceNumber# info.SocialInsuranceFlag=#SocialInsuranceFlag# info.SocialInsuranceNumber=#SocialInsuranceNumber# info.LivingState=#LivingState# info.OldManIdentity=#OldManIdentity# info.AreaId=#AreaId# info.AreaId2=#AreaId2# info.AreaId3=#AreaId3# info.Address=#Address# info.LongitudeS=#LongitudeS# info.LatitudeS=#LatitudeS# info.PostCode=#PostCode# info.Tel=#Tel# info.Mobile=#Mobile# info.Remark=#Remark# info.InputCode1=#InputCode1# info.InputCode2=#InputCode2# r.RoomId=#RoomId# r.RoomNo=#RoomNo# r.FloorNo=#FloorNo# r.ExtNo=#ExtNo# r.BedNo=#BedNo# r.OccupancyNumber=#OccupancyNumber# r.StationId=#StationId# r.BeginDate=#BeginDate# r.EndDate=#EndDate#
oms.UserId=#UserId#
$WhereClause$ ) abc )x where x.SN > ($PageNo$-1)*$PageSize$

select 1 as NoUse,a.*, b.RoomId,b.FloorNo,b.RoomNo ,b.ExtNo,b.BedNo,b.OccupancyNumber,b.SickBedNo,c.CallNo from Pam_PensionAgencyObjectBaseInfo a left join (select x.OldManId,x.SickBedNo,y.* From Pam_RoomOldMan x inner join Pam_Room y on x.RoomId=y.RoomId where GETDATE() between x.BeginDate and x.EndDate and y.Status=1 and y.StationId='$StationId$') b on a.OldManId=b.OldManId left join Pam_AgencyObjectConfigInfo c on a.OldManId=c.OldManId
a.OldManId=#OldManId# a.Id=#Id# a.CheckInTime>=to_date(#CheckInTime_Start#||' 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') a.CheckInTime<=to_date(#CheckInTime_End#||' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') a.Status=#Status# a.OperatedBy=#OperatedBy# a.OperatedOn>=to_date(#OperatedOn_Start#||' 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') a.OperatedOn<=to_date(#OperatedOn_End#||' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') a.DataSource=#DataSource# a.OldManName=#OldManName# a.Gender=#Gender# a.Birthday>=to_date(#Birthday_Start#||' 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') a.Birthday<=to_date(#Birthday_End#||' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') a.IDNo=#IDNo# a.HealthInsuranceFlag=#HealthInsuranceFlag# a.HealthInsuranceNumber=#HealthInsuranceNumber# a.SocialInsuranceFlag=#SocialInsuranceFlag# a.SocialInsuranceNumber=#SocialInsuranceNumber# a.LivingState=#LivingState# a.OldManIdentity=#OldManIdentity# a.AreaId=#AreaId# a.AreaId2=#AreaId2# a.AreaId3=#AreaId3# a.Address=#Address# a.LongitudeS=#LongitudeS# a.LatitudeS=#LatitudeS# a.PostCode=#PostCode# a.Tel=#Tel# a.Mobile=#Mobile# a.Remark=#Remark# a.InputCode1=#InputCode1# a.InputCode2=#InputCode2# a.ResidentStatus=#ResidentStatus# a.DischargeTime>=to_date(#DischargeTime_Start#||' 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') a.DischargeTime<=to_date(#DischargeTime_End#||' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') a.DischargeNote=#DischargeNote# a.StationId=#StationId# b.RoomId=#RoomId# b.FloorNo=#FloorNo# b.RoomNo=#RoomNo# b.ExtNo=#ExtNo# b.BedNo=#BedNo# b.OccupancyNumber=#OccupancyNumber# b.SickBedNo=#SickBedNo# c.CallNo=#CallNo# $WhereClause$
